channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: hiddify /hiddify-app | Dart | 26,420
item.description: Multi-platform auto-proxy client, supporting Sing-box, X-ray, TUIC, Hysteria, Reality, Trojan, SSH etc. It’s an open-source, secure and ad-free.

item.title: cloudflare /agents | TypeScript | 3,460
item.description: Build and deploy AI Agents on Cloudflare

item.title: RichardAtCT /claude-code-telegram | Python | 1,411
item.description: A powerful Telegram bot that provides remote access to Claude Code, enabling developers to interact with their projects from anywhere with full AI assistance and session persistence.

item.title: HandsOnLLM /Hands-On-Large-Language-Models | Jupyter Notebook | 22,591
item.description: Official code repo for the O'Reilly Book - "Hands-On Large Language Models"

item.title: anthropics /claude-code | Shell | 68,447
item.description: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

item.title: obra /superpowers | Shell | 57,051
item.description: An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works.

item.title: abhigyanpatwari /GitNexus | TypeScript | 1,068
item.description: GitNexus: The Zero-Server Code Intelligence Engine - GitNexus is a client-side knowledge graph creator that runs entirely in your browser. Drop in a GitHub repo or ZIP file, and get an interactive knowledge graph wit a built in Graph RAG Agent. Perfect for code exploration

item.title: vxcontrol /pentagi | Go | 5,651
item.description: ✨ Fully autonomous AI Agents system capable of performing complex penetration testing tasks
